name: Elevator Simulator (GameDev&Design)
description:
This is an elevator simulator I made to work with serial ports and a microcontroller for a class project. It also works as a standalone PC interactable, which is how its designed for this site. 

Using the WASD to move, ENTER to enter, the ARROW KEYS for directions up and down, for both the elevator and the stairs, and the MOUSE to select buttons on the inner elevator panel.

Have Fun!

The ESC key will end the program.
